data.subtitle: Hi!
data.text: I'm Emilia. I'm a junior javascript developer, with fluenly in frontend and backend. I use principally React, Redux, Node, Express and Sequalize. I'm looking forward to keep learning

data.subtitle: Work experiencie
data.text:
- Tutor at Henry (since September 2020)

I give extra classes of the topics of each class, I solve doubts and I give moral support

- Teaching Assistant at ISFT 182 (since March 2020)

I offered two workshops on gamification and use of video games for libraries

- Substitutions in school libraries (2017 to 2019)

This experience taught me a lot to work in large teams of people with different ideas and to manage groups. I read tales, poetry and gived workshops in primary and secondary schools
